title: ABC at Risk of Losing Billions in `Pink Slime' Lawsuit (Audio)
itunes:title: ABC at Risk of Losing Billions in `Pink Slime' Lawsuit (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Matthew Schettenhelm, a litigation analyst for Bloomberg Intelligence, discusses a lawsuit against ABC News, which accuses the network of making false and misleading statements about the food additive “pink slime” in a series of reports. He speaks with June Grasso and Greg Stohr on Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
